title: Strategies for Enhancing Science Learning Effectiveness in Higher Education Through Online Video Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and intermediate-level specialization in the field
context.additional_context: Blended learning utilizing video content for professional learners in environments where digital devices are provided.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more self-directed learning strategies using video content.
Learners can design two or more integration plans linking video-based learning activities with in-person classes.
Learners can utilize formative assessment results at an 80% or higher rate to evaluate the effectiveness of video learning tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
